member.name: P:GsmComm.Server.SmsServer.IsSecured
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security is enabled for the server.

remarks.para: When security is enabled, only user identities authenticated by Windows are allowed to connect to the server and the communication between server and client is encrypted. Clients must also have security enabled to be able to connect to the server.
Additionally, access may be allowed or denied for specific users when in secure mode. This is currently determined by the property that specifies whether anonymous users can connect or not.
If this property is changed, while the server is running, the server must be restarted.
